section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: In text, processors SHOULD render the contents of superscript as a typographical superscript. In audio and other rendering formats, processors MAY distinguish the contents of superscript in some other way.

section.title: XDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of superscript in an XDITA topic.
section.pre:
Franchise Requirements

Franchised restaurants should be located in areas of at least 200 ft2.

section.title: HDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of superscript in an HDITA topic.
section.pre:
Franchise Requirements

Franchised restaurants should be located in areas of at least 200 ft2.
